CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Riverbend Plantation relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Riverbend Plantation is {above} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Whispering Willows Estate}.

VE.Q: What is Riverbend Plantation's Livestock Production in 2001?
VE.A: Riverbend Plantation's livestock production in 2001 is {99574.90} tons.

VE.Q: What is Riverbend Plantation's Livestock Production in 2000?
VE.A: Riverbend Plantation's livestock production in 2000 is {97138.31} tons.

VE.Q: What is Sunstone Farms's Livestock Production in 2000?
VE.A: Sunstone Farms's livestock production in 2000 is {97069.79} tons.

VE.Q: What are the livestock production of Riverbend Plantation, Sunstone Farms, and Whispering Willows Estate in 1997?
VE.A: Riverbend Plantation's livestock production is {89965.12} tons, Sunstone Farms's livestock production is {90433.11} tons, Whispering Willows Estate's livestock production is {25664.16} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Livestock Production in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum livestock production is {12012.35} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Livestock Production in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum livestock production is {490643.62} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Livestock Production level recorded for Golden Harvest Cooperative?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative reached approximately {490643.62} tons in {2005}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Livestock Production level recorded for Golden Harvest Cooperative?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's lowest recorded level is approximately {49435.95} tons in {1981}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Livestock Production?
SC.A: The average total livestock production is {389104.65} tons.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Livestock Production exceed 458124.22 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Livestock Production go below 275686.42 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Livestock Production fall between 348560.05 and 385250.59 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 2000, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1987 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1994 and 2000 was {higher} than between 1987 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1996, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1990 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1994 and 1996 was {lower} than between 1990 and 2005.

NC.Q: Was the total Livestock Production in 1990 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total livestock production in 1990 was {lower} than in 2002.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1999, did the total Livestock Production experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total livestock production between 1981 and 1999 was {larger} than between 1982 and 1984.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Golden Harvest Cooperative} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Whispering Willows Estate, Sunstone Farms, Riverbend Plantation, Golden Harvest Cooperative}.
